text_block_list.text: It was the week after Rhein Kraft had won the 『Fillies' Review』. This time, it was Cesario's turn to run the 『Flower C』.
(This is her first attempt at a major and she was overwhelmingly the favorite……I was worried the pressure might be a little much for her, but――)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Fuu――!!

text_block_list.name: Live Announcer
text_block_list.text: And it's Cesario! Cesario pulls out in front! A lead of 2 lengths, now 3 lengths! Cesario is out front!!

text_block_list.name: Live Announcer
text_block_list.text: ――Goal!! First place is Cesario!! On the last straight, she showed us the difference in strength!!

text_block_list.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Uwaah~! Seriously!? Isn't that a record time too!? Amazing~~……!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hold on……this is……just too incredible. Cesario-san……that girl, just how far will she――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (How far……? Just how far will Cesario go……? Just how much……will I have to do――!?)

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text: ――And now you're watching a special VTR…… for the 『Oka Sho』, as expected, aren't Rhein Kraft and Cesario the focus of attention!?

text_block_list.name: Commentator A
text_block_list.text: That's true. Within the Tiara rotation, the abilities of those two are a cut above, without a doubt.

text_block_list.name: Commentator B
text_block_list.text: Will it be Rhein Kraft's powerful leader strength, or Cesario's sharp closing leg! We can expect a heated first time showdown at the 『Oka Sho』.

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text: And then there's something that both of them have in common! They are both members of the same team, <Ascella>, and so――!

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text: Today, we have <Ascella>'s trainer here with us! Trainer-san, for the upcoming 『Oka Sho』 what kind of advice have you given them!?
I was already at a loss for words. It was obviously because I was both Rhein Kraft's and Cesario's trainer.
Creating a training menu geared towards victory at the 『Oka Sho』. This was an important duty as their trainer. However――
For Rhein Kraft, the main point of her menu would end up being 『Countermeasures against Cesario』.
Similarly, for Cesario, it would end up being 『Countermeasures against Rhein Kraft』.
……Of course, I instructed to the best of my ability. For both Rhein Kraft and Cesario.
I'd be glad if either of them won, but…… I also want both of them to win. Which is why I intended to provide equal guidance to both.
――that's how I ended up answering……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa…… ……Haa……!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Haa……no!! Like this, I'll still get overtaken……! Cesario will……catch me……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: The 『Oka Sho』 is so soon…… What should I do……? Like this, I'll……!
At that time. Rhein Kraft looked so desperate that I――
Taking a solid lead using your power and then breaking away is your strongest point. Even at the 『Oka Sho』 you need to be conscious of using the best of your abilities.
Taking a solid lead using your power and then breaking away is your strongest point. Even at the 『Oka Sho』 you need to be conscious of using the best of your abilities.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san……but, that's……!
Believe in the skills you've honed until now, Kraft. Also…… you can try accelerating a little earlier than in the previous race.
Believe in the skills you've honed until now, Kraft. Also…… you can try accelerating a little earlier than in the previous race.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: These members……? Um, what do you mean?
……No, maybe that was unnecessary. Don't worry about it. Anyways, try pushing forward a little sooner than usual.
……No, maybe that was unnecessary. Don't worry about it. Anyways, try pushing forward a little sooner than usual.
You're strong at maintaining a high pace……the advantage of 『Maintaining Pace』. If you pull ahead early, you'll definitely be able to hold on until the end.
choice_data_list: You'll be fine. I believe in you
You'll be fine. I believe in you

text_block_list.text: You're strong at maintaining a high pace……the advantage of 『Maintaining Pace』. If you pull ahead early, you'll definitely be able to hold on until the end.
choice_data_list: You'll be fine. I believe in you
You'll be fine. I believe in you

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: My strength…… ……Okay. I understand! Thank you very much!!
(For the Oka Sho……based on the members, there's a high probability of everyone jostling for position. It wasn't a good idea to be stuck in the crowd for too long.)
(So……it would be more advantageous for Kraft to pull ahead earlier. ……that much was true.)
(But then, shouldn't I tell Cesario to be careful not to get surrounded since she'd be running more towards the back?)
(But then, shouldn't I tell Cesario to be careful not to get surrounded since she'd be running more towards the back?)
(It might be unnecessary. Whether or not it would be a problem depends on how the race develops. Since she has overwhelming strength, it might be better to focus on her own running)
(Don't get distracted by your surroundings, concentrate on maintaining form and focus only on your own running. That would be best for Cesario――)
I might……be acting like I want Kraft to win more……
I might……be acting like I want Kraft to win more……
(With 1600m, Kraft might have a chance. But, the next race, Oaks…… at 2400m, honestly, it would probably be difficult……)
choice_data_list: No, I can't! As a trainer――

text_block_list.text: (Bzzzz-! Bzzzz-!)
That scared me……a LANE from Rhein Kraft? Not in the Team <Ascella> group chat, but a DM……?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: 『Trainer-san, good evening! I'm sorry for the sudden contact, but I want to ask you for a favor』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: 『Saturday, tomorrow at 11AM, can you come with me to the riverbed for independent training?』
I see, the 『Oka Sho』 is soon after all. So of course she'd want to dig in…… Alright, for now I'll reply that it's OK……wait, huh?
I see, the 『Oka Sho』 is soon after all. So of course she'd want to dig in…… Alright, for now I'll reply that it's OK……wait, huh?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: 『Trainer, I'd like some advice regarding extra training. Saturday, at 11AM, can you accompany me to the riverbed?』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: 『I want to run more this weekend, no matter what!』

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: 『I cannot afford to lose the Oka Sho』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! Let's do some individual training!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Trainer, let's do some individual training.

text_block_list.name: Kraft&Cesario
text_block_list.text: Please!

text_block_list.name: Kraft&Cesario
text_block_list.text: Trainer(-san)!!
……wait, huh!? That voice……came from outside!?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Sorry for coming in uninvited. ……Trainer, you look pale? Are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Fuu……Fufufuu, Ahahahaha! It's fine now right, Cesario……!? One-two!

text_block_list.name: Kraft&Cesario
text_block_list.text: Prank successful~!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Seems like we caused you quite a bit of trouble, huh? Sorry, Trainer. The earlier LANE messages were a joke that Kraft and I thought up.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Lately, Trainer-san, it looks like you've always been deep in thought……earlier today when I was training, it almost seemed like your eyes were spinning.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: But, that's why, even if it was a bit forceful, we wanted to tell you. ……Trainer-san, we both understand your feelings.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: You've put a lot of thought and heart in to it, haven't you? You've been trying to keep the training even between Kraft and me.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Isn't that something unbelievable!? To ensure that either one of us wins, and since we're both on the same team, to be able to give both of us equal guidance on how to win.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: It must have been hard to bear…… Thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Trainer. For now, can you just believe in us……? Until the 『Oka Sho』 can you leave the training to us?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Of course, if we're really troubled we'll ask for help though! However, how should I say it…… for now, we just want you to watch over us.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: We'll train with all our strength, and we'll win. At the 『Oka Sho』――for sure!
――Ahh, damnit!!
――Ahh, geez!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Eh, eh!? T-Trainer-san!?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Oh……! Your cheeks are turning bright red! We should get some ice!
It's fine! Sorry. I'm pathetic, I couldn't hide it and had to have you two do that for me……
It's fine! Sorry. I'm pathetic, I couldn't hide it and had to have you two do that for me……
……I'm sure this won't be the last time. But, I'm your trainer. I can't have you do everything……will you let me help you?
……I'm sure this won't be the last time. But, I'm your trainer. I can't have you do everything……will you let me help you?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san……! Fufuu. ……As I thought, you really are someone that won't give up!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Yes, please do. ……I look forward to working with you, Trainer.
They both gave me a clear response. I was greatly encouraged by their growth……
